article_title: PRESIDENTIAL DREAMS: Cody Daniels of Havasu plans to meet Barack Obama through Make-A-Wish

Today’s News-Herald

og.description: Havasu resident Cody Daniels plans to meet President Barack Obama on Wednesday, the fulfillment of a request made to the Make-A-Wish Foundation three years ago. For Daniels and his family,
